title: Carrot Weather gains forecast layers and map redesign with 3D globe view, smart zoom, much more
content:
After winning both an Apple Design Award and an App of the Year Award last year, Carrot Weather is out with its first major update for 2022. Arriving with this release is a rebuilt and faster than ever weather maps experience, layers for forecasts, access to individual radar stations, a new smart zoom feature, and more.

more…

The post Carrot Weather gains forecast layers and map redesign with 3D globe view, smart zoom, much more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Carrot Weather is out with a major update with an all-new maps experience featuring a 3D globe view, forecast layers, and much more.
